product_name: BriogeoStyle + Treat Yuzu + Plum Oil Hair Styling Sleek Stick
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBriogeo Style + Treat Yuzu + Plum Oil Hair Styling Sleek Stick. A smooth, glidable styling stick that slicks back hair into the perfect ponytail or pulled-back style for a frizz-free finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsTames flyaways and frizz with a nourishing blend of highly conditioning ingredientsSculpts and polishes for a slicked-back look on all hair types + texturesProvides a sleek, glossy finish with 24-hour holdKey IngredientsYuzu Extract: A powerful antioxidant that protects hair from environmental aggressorsPlum Oil: Provides lightweight moisture for softer, shinier, healthier-looking hairSuper B-Complex: A proprietary blend of B vitamins that work together to promote healthy-looking hairResearch Results24 hour hold**Based upon third-party laboratory studyItem 2623609How To UseApply directly to dry hair and use a comb to smooth and slick down.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate*, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Hydrogenated Castor Oil*, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides*, Stearyl Behenate*, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax*, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil*, Glyceryl Stearate SE*, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil*, Citrus Junos Peel Extract*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables*, Shorea Robusta Resin*, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax*, Kaolin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Biotin, Folic Acid, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate*, Maltodextrin*, Calcium Pantothenate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pyridoxine HCl, Silica, Fragrance (Parfum)
how_to_use: Apply directly to dry hair and use a comb to smooth and slick down.

reviews.headline: Greasy
reviews.comments: It worked but I needed to use a lot and then my hair looked greasy. Maybe it would be better if you have straight hair, not curly. I also had to wash my hair about 3 times to get it all out.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I've substituted hairspray with the product and it's been great for my slick backs. My hair used to come out of a slick back but now it stays all day.

reviews.headline: great hair stick!
reviews.comments: this was one of the first hair sticks i tried and one of my favorite formulas! it was very easy to apply, very longlasting, and fairly easy to wash out. the only reason i would hesitate to recommend this product is because of the price. for a similar price you can use other hair sticks with much more product.

reviews.headline: First styling stick ever and I picked a winner!
reviews.comments: I debated on this stick or the much-lauded TIGI Bed Head stick to assist with a slicked back bun for an outdoor wedding with temps in the high 90s and humidity to match. This held up well and was easy to use. I use it on my 7 yo's curly edges too!

reviews.headline: Amazing !
reviews.comments: Love it! Such a good and healthier alternative to hair spray and other hold products.

reviews.headline: Amazing !
reviews.comments: Love it! Such a good and healthier alternative to hair spray and other hold products.

reviews.headline: Greasy
reviews.comments:
Very greasy and too hydrating
Minimal hold. 

Pros:
Smells nice

reviews.headline: New favorite product
reviews.comments: This wax stick is small but MIGHTY!!! It is my new favorite purchase for 2025! It holds down my fly-aways without being sticky or extra hard. It does not leave any cast on my edges at all. This stick is amazing for my blow outs and silk presses.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again very easy to use
reviews.comments: I don't usually use sticks but this one is good, small, and works well

reviews.headline: Average hair stick
reviews.comments: I was surprised by how small it was, def expected it to be bigger for the price point! I liked that it didn't have a smell. It held down flyaways for a few hours, but they stood back up later, so it needs to be reapplied throughout the day. It will make your hair greasy bc it's like wax. It's an average product compared to the hair wax stick I previously used. But let's be real...I would probably buy this again.

reviews.headline: Favorite new product
reviews.comments: I didnt want to love this so much becuase of the price tag. But its so great for smoothing my frizz and baby hair, whether my hair is curly or straight. It glides on easily and doesnt leave wax chunks or sticky residue

reviews.headline: Expensive
reviews.comments: Not bad works fine.

reviews.headline: Used twice then lost it?
reviews.comments: Gave a nice slick back  to tame fly aways. Unfortunately I lost it soon after purchase so we'll see if it turns up if not, it's worth another purchase

reviews.headline: Perfect on the go
reviews.comments: This is perfect on the go to tame baby hairs that stick out. Apply very sparingly and you won't look greasy.

reviews.headline: Pulls out baby hairs
reviews.comments: This pulls out my baby hairs that ive been trying so hard to regrow post partum

reviews.headline: Doesn't wash out
reviews.comments: I wanted to love it but by the end of the day my hair just looks stringy and greasy and no linger slicked. It also doesn not wash out until after 2 or 3 showers (and i double shampoo each shower) and just looks greasy the next day

reviews.headline: I have tried several different styling products
reviews.comments: This product really controls unruly flyaways when I put my hair in a ponytail.

reviews.headline: Oily!!
reviews.comments: Soooo oily. Yes i guess it sleeks but it makes it so oily that it doesnt LOOK sleek at all. Just dirty

reviews.headline: Small but mighty
reviews.comments: I tried many of the "trending" or employee recommended sticks, and they were too heavy, and left a residue on my hair. This stick is easier to travel with and works well. I did have to use a fine tooth comb after applying in order to lay the hairs flat, but that was no big deal.  It is a lot smaller than I thought it would be for the price, so unless it is on sale or I can use a coupon I would probably not re purchase.

reviews.headline: it works!
reviews.comments: When I pull my straight hair back in a bun, This sleek stick smooths them down without being oily,  and it is nice and smooth for the day.  I do not know how much is in the container it only takes a small amount to lay those hairs down smooth!

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm so happy that I came across this product because in summer, high-slick pants are irreplaceable for me since my long hair irritates me when it's hot. I struggle with fly-away strands which create a messy look. I was looking for a product that does not make my hair greasy but makes my hairstyle look sleek. This stick is very easy to use. Most importantly, it is very easy to reapply because sometimes I need to fix my hair afterward, even though it has a nice hold. I don't like getting my hands messy when I'm outside applying gel or something similar, and this product is a lifesaver in those cases. It effortlessly fixes my hair with no mess and doesn't make it look dirty or greasy. I like that it contains amazing ingredients like vitamins and essential oils which are great for my hair, and it is clean. I'll definitely be repurchasing this product in the future. Kudos to Briogeo for creating such a product. gifted by Briogeo.
faceoff_positive.headline: Obsessed!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I really had high hopes for this product and it had good reviews from others so I decided to splurge. Since it is summer and I have LONG straight hair, it iis up in a ponytail most days. First, the product is super tiny. I realize pics can be deceiving but wow it's tiny. The size is great for portablilty though as you can just toss it in your purse. Secondly, in using the product, it put the flyaways at bay for a short period, but at the expense of my hair looking completely oily and greasy in addition to feeling that way also, yet product feature advertising says the opposite? I wish it was a product that was worth the money I paid. Too expensive ,too small, ineffective, and no good smell.  either. Ugh
faceoff_negative.headline: Greasy Hair

rollup.name: Style + Treat Yuzu + Plum Oil Hair Styling Sleek Stick
